TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlWriterTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将跟踪或调试输出作为 XML 编码的数据定向到 或 （如 ）。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output as XML-encoded data to a or to a , such as a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您必须具有非托管代码权限才能创建 类的实例。You must have unmanaged code permission to create an instance of the class. 类将跟踪和调试信息转换为 XML 编码的文本流。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 下面的表显示了 XML 输出的说明。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables that follow. 您可以使用[服务跟踪查看器工具（svctraceviewer.exe）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)来显示 XML 输出。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the XML output. 你可以通过应用程序配置文件启用或禁用 ，然后在你的应用程序中使用配置的 。You can enable or disable an through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，您可以在代码中创建 。Alternately, you can create an in your code. 若要配置 ，请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To configure an , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加或删除侦听器，设置侦听器的属性，或删除侦听器。In this file, you can add or remove a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove listeners. 配置文件的格式应与下面的示例类似。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 类从基类 继承 属性。The class inherits the property from the base class . 属性允许侦听器上的其他级别的跟踪输出筛选。The property allows an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果存在筛选器，则跟踪侦听器的 `Trace` 方法将调用筛选器的 方法来确定是否发出跟踪。If there is a filter present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试写入正在使用或不可用的文件，则该文件名将自动以 GUID 为前缀。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器方法旨在由 、和 类的方法调用。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 侦听器方法不应在应用程序代码中直接调用。The listener methods are not intended to be called directly from application code. 侦听器主要供 类使用。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 和 方法可由 和 类调用，并为 和 不提供值的 XML 元素提供默认值。The and methods can be called by the and classes, and default values are provided for the XML elements that and do not supply values for. 下表介绍了 XML 输出的元素和属性。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|特性Attributes|OutputOutput|说明Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|NoneNone|取决于 属性中是否存在 标志。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字符（如 > 或 <）将替换为转义序列。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 请参阅后面的转义字符转换表。See the escaped character translation table that follows.| |`Computer`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.| 属性的值。The value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|始终存在Always present|如果未指定，则默认值为空 GUID。If not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取决于跟踪方法调用中是否存在 `relatedActivityId` 参数。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the Trace method call.| 方法的 `relatedActivityId` 参数。The `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`DataItem`|NoneNone|取决于 方法的 `data` 参数。Depends on the `data` parameter of the method.|此元素可以包含元素数组或一个元素，因此，这些值将作为一组 `DataItem` 节点写入 `TraceData` 元素下。This element can contain an array of elements or one element, so the values are written as a set of `DataItem` nodes under the `TraceData` element.

数据输出使用传入数据对象的 `ToString` 方法。The data output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`EventID`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入（`id`）。Parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessName`|始终存在。Always present.|从 。From the .| ||`ProcessID`|始终存在。Always present.|从 。From the . 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 操作系统上，如果 `ProcessID` 大于2147483647，则它是负数的正表示形式，应转换为获取正确的进程标识符。On Windows 98 and Windows Me operating systems, if `ProcessID` is greater than 2,147,483,647 it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|始终存在。Always present.|从 。From the .| |`Level`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入（`eventType`的数值）。Parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 大于255的参数值输出为255。Parameter values greater than 255 are output as 255.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|NoneNone|取决于 属性中是否存在 标志。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|可以有多个逻辑操作，因此这些值作为 `LogicalOperation` 节点写入 `LogicalOperationStack` 元素下。There can be more than one logical operation, so the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`Message`|NoneNone|取决于跟踪方法调用中是否存在消息。Depends on the presence of a message in the Trace method call.|如果提供了格式设置参数，则此元素是已格式化的消息。This element is a formatted message if formatting arguments are provided.| |`Source`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入。Parameter input.| |`SubType`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入。Parameter input.| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|始终存在。Always present.|如果 中不存在，则默认值为当前时间。If not present in the , the default is the current time.| |`TimeStamp`|NoneNone|取决于 属性中是否存在 标志。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|从 。From the .| |`Type`|NoneNone|始终存在。Always present.|始终为值3。Always the value 3.| 下表显示了在 XML 输出中转义的字符。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 转义发生在除 `DataItem` 元素之外的所有元素和属性中，如果传递给 方法的 `data` 参数的对象是 对象，则不会对其进行转义。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes with the exception of the `DataItem` element, which is not escaped if the object passed to the `data` parameter of the method is an object. 如果对数据对象使用 ，则将调用 方法，并将整个根节点作为非转义数据进行跟踪。If an is used for the data object, the method is called and the entire root node is traced as unescaped data. |转义字符Escaped character|“值”Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类将转义和非转义的数据写入文件日志。The following code example shows the use of the class to write both escaped and non-escaped data to file logs. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/VB/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 编码为指定路径上的指定文件初始化 类的新实例。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果文件存在，则将其追加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果该文件不存在，则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少异常的几率，任何可能使输出无效的字符都将替换为 "？" 字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 属性被初始化为空字符串（""）。The property is initialized to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `null``name` 参数，则此构造函数将 属性初始化为 `name` 参数值或空字符串（""）。This constructor initializes the property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 该名称可用作 集合中的索引，以编程方式更改侦听器的属性。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码设置的实例的 属性 其 属性为 "xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 编码为指定路径上的指定文件初始化 类的新实例。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果文件存在，则将其追加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果该文件不存在，则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少异常的几率，任何可能使输出无效的字符都将替换为 "？" 字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 如果 `null``name` 参数，则 属性设置为 `name` 参数值或空字符串（""）。The property is set to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 该名称可用作 集合中的索引，以编程方式更改侦听器的属性。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码设置的实例的 属性 其 属性为 "xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp. ```

summary.span: 关闭该侦听器的 ，以使其不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

span.span: Closes the for this listener so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

summary.span: 将包含错误信息和详细错误信息的跟踪信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information including an error message and a detailed error message to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认行为是在用户界面模式下运行应用程序时，将消息和详细消息显示在消息框中，并显示在 集合中的 实例中。The default behavior is to display the message and detailed message in a message box when the application is running in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. 默认情况下，集合包含 的实例。By default, the collection contains an instance of . 可以通过在集合中添加或删除 来自定义此行为。You can customize this behavior by adding or removing a from the collection.

summary.span: 向输出文件或流中写入跟踪数据。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A data object to emit.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`、`source`、`eventType`和 `id` 参数用于跟踪的页眉和页脚。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在写入之前，`id` 参数会转换为无符号整数，因此会将负的 `id` 值编写为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data` 参数以 `TraceData` 元素中的 `DataItem` 节点的形式写入。The `data` parameter is written as a `DataItem` node in the `TraceData` element. 数据对象的 `ToString` 方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由 、和 类的方法调用，用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, params object[] data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object[] data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, ParamArray data As Object())

public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ data);
override this.TraceData : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * obj[] -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要发出的数据对象的数组。

span.span: An array of data objects to emit.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`、`source`、`eventType`和 `id` 参数用于跟踪的页眉和页脚。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在写入之前，`id` 参数会转换为无符号整数，因此会将负的 `id` 值编写为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data` 参数数组中的对象作为 `TraceData` 元素中的 `DataItem` 节点写入。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `DataItem` nodes in the `TraceData` element. 每个数据对象的 `ToString` 方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由 、和 类的方法调用，用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 将事件跟踪信息写入输出文件或流中。

span.span: Writes event trace information to the output file or stream.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`、`source`、`eventType`和 `id` 参数用于跟踪的页眉和页脚。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在写入之前，`id` 参数会转换为无符号整数，因此会将负的 `id` 值编写为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message` 参数以 `Message` 元素的形式写入。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由 、和 类的方法调用，用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceEvent(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, string format, object[] args) cil managed

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: format
param.span: 包含零个或多个格式项的格式字符串，这些项与 数组中的对象相对应。

span.span: A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the array.

param.name: args
param.span: 包含零个或多个要格式化的对象的对象数组。

span.span: An object array containing zero or more objects to format.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、格式化消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`、`source`、`eventType`和 `id` 参数用于跟踪的页眉和页脚。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在写入之前，`id` 参数会转换为无符号整数，因此会将负的 `id` 值编写为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 调用 方法，将 `format` 字符串和 `args` 数组作为参数传递，将 `args` 对象数组格式化为 `Message` 元素。The method is called, passing in the `format` string and `args` array as parameters, to format the `args` object array as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由 、和 类的方法调用，用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceTransfer (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, int id, string message, Guid relatedActivityId);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceTransfer(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, int32 id, string message, valuetype System.Guid relatedActivityId) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceTransfer (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)
public: override void TraceTransfer(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, int id, System::String ^ message, Guid relatedActivityId);
override this.TraceTransfer : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * int * string * Guid -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A trace message to write.

param.name: relatedActivityId
param.span: 标识相关活动的 结构。

span.span: A structure that identifies a related activity.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息（包括相关活动的标识）、消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于相关跟踪的关联。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. `eventCache`、`source`、`id`和 `relatedActivityId` 参数用于跟踪的页眉和页脚。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在写入之前，`id` 参数会转换为无符号整数，因此会将负的 `id` 值编写为大正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message` 参数以 `Message` 元素的形式写入。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. 调用 方法，将 `relatedActivityId`值转换为显示在标头中的 "B" 格式字符串。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId`value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. 页脚中的 `SubTypeName` 元素将跟踪事件类型标识为 。The `SubTypeName` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应由应用程序代码调用 方法。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它应由 对象调用，以便为其 方法发出跟踪信息。It is intended to be called by a object to emit the trace information for its method.

override this.Write : string -> unit

span.span: The message to write.

summary.span: 将不包含任何其他上下文信息的原义消息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可在日志输出中包含上下文信息。Use the method to include context information in the log output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可在日志输出中包含上下文信息。Use the method to include context information in the log output.
